Text: My grandfather died in a concentration camp. He fell from a guard tower.

PEACE and LOVE

Great documentaries but very,very painful.How can a complete nation(Germany) of so called "civilized people" hate a complete race so much?But then from the hateful comments over here ,I realize,humans never learn.But I thank you for these documentaries;they have left me a changed man ,but a better man I assure you.
